title: Episode 29 w/ Tru Life
itunes:title: Episode 29 w/ Tru Life
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys sit down with Tru Life. The guys discuss Tru Life's come up, working with Future, Dungeon Family, Snoop Dogg, Nas, Jay-z, and his new endeavors following his recent coming home. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
